publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2711.1 Tommy Sheridan: UN 0.7% GNP Target for Development Assistance—As an amendment to motion (S1M-2711) in the name of Des McNulty, leave out from "believes" to end and insert "and criticises Her Majesty’s Government for not achieving the UN 0.7% GNP target."
S1M-2711.1 UN 0.7% GNP Target for Development Assistance (lodged on 8 February 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2711.1 UN 0.7% GNP Target for Development Assistance (lodged on 8 February 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2711.1 UN 0.7% GNP Target for Development Assistance (lodged on 8 February 2002) Robert Brown*
